Antara Biswas Wiki | Height | Movies | Photos | Biography | Age

Bolly Reporter | January 4, 2020May 10, 2019 | Bhojpuri Actress

Antara Biswas also is known as Mona Lisa is an Indian actress mostly known for the Bhojpuri motion picture industry. She has done over 125 Bhojpuri films and has also acted in Hindi, Bengali, Oriya, Tamil, Kannada and Telugu films. She was a participant of Indian show Bigg Boss 10 in 2016.

Biography & Wiki

Antara Biswas’s other name is Mona Lisa. She was born on 21 October 1982 in Kolkata, West Bengal, India into a Hindu-Bengali family. Hence, her current age is 37 years. Antara’s Zodiac is Libra.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Height in centimeters165 cm

Family Members

FatherNot Known

Education and School, College

Antara completed her schooling from the Julien Day School in Elgin Road, South Kolkata. After that, she completed her graduation in Sanskrit from Ashutosh College of the University of Calcutta.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Monalisa married Bhojpuri actor Vikrant Singh Rajpoot in the Bigg Boss house on 17 January 2017.

Favorite Things and Hobbies

HobbiesPhotography, Dancing

Antara Biswas filmography

Antara began her profession with the first Bhojpuri film “Bole Shankar” which was released in 2008. Monalisa is the stand outperforming artist who worked with practically every Bhojpuri whizzes like Pawan Singh, Dinesh Lal Yadav, and others.

Antara Biswas can be credited for the rise of the Bhojpuri industry in recent years. Her strong on-screen presence is highly appreciated by the audience and has won millions of hearts. In 2010, The Hindu reported that Mona Lisa (along with Rinku Ghosh) was the most sought after actress in the Bhojpuri film industry.

She acted in several low budget films before making her debut in Bollywood with Blackmail, starring Ajay Devgn and Suniel Shetty.

The celebrity dance reality shows Nach Baliye is ready to launch its next season on Star and. As per the most recent reports, Bigg Boss contestant Monalisa has been approached for the show along with her husband Vikrant Singh Rajpoot.

Bhojpuri star Monalisa introduced as Jhuma Boudi in web-series Dupur Thakurpo season 2

Salary and Net Worth

Antara has an estimated net worth of almost $5 Million. She earns almost ₹25 lakh per movie she plays as salary.

Contact Address

House AddressNot Available
Phone NumberShe didn’t like to share her Phone number publicly.
Email IdNot Available

Facts about Antara Biswas

  • The stage name ‘Mona Lisa’ was suggested to Antara by her uncle.
  • She started her career as a model in Oriya video albums.
  • Monalisa then shifted to the Bhojpuri film industry, where she appeared in many B-grade movies; she has been a part of more than 50 such movies.
  • In 2010, The Hindu reported that Monalisa was one of the most sought after actresses in the Bhojpuri film industry.
  • In 2016, Monalisa participated in the renowned reality TV show- Bigg Boss Season 10 and got married in the Bigg Boss House with her long-time boyfriend Vikrant Singh Rajpoot.
